T.content: “can one puncture the tympanum” of philosophy—its percussion (which amortizes impressions, typoi resonate)—a place of exteriority, alterity where one can still treat of philosophy?
T.linkedContent: “can one puncture the tympanum” of philosophy—its percussion (which amortizes impressions, typoi resonate)—a place of exteriority, alterity where one can still treat of philosophy?

T.content: makes types (typoi) resonate by striking the typtein
T.linkedContent: makes types (typoi) resonate by striking the typtein

T.content: is there any ruse not belonging to reason which will prevent philosophy from borrowing its categories from logos of other, affecting itself w/out delay [see POOF p. 1]?
T.linkedContent: is there any ruse not belonging to reason which will prevent philosophy from borrowing its categories from logos of other, affecting itself w/out delay [see POOF p. 1]?

T.content: philosophize w/ hammer, batter their ears, Dionysiansism, sound of tympani
T.linkedContent: philosophize w/ hammer, batter their ears, Dionysiansism, sound of tympani

T.content: [Derrida’s oblique ear—not perpendicular—to hear the margins] tympanum squints (louche) [so does the slave who loves secrets in On the Geneal…]
T.linkedContent: [Derrida’s oblique ear—not perpendicular—to hear the margins] tympanum squints (louche) [so does the slave who loves secrets in On the Geneal…]

T.content: if tympanum is a limit, unhinge concept of limit > no limit in general, every limus, the limes, short cut, the oblique
T.linkedContent: if tympanum is a limit, unhinge concept of limit > no limit in general, every limus, the limes, short cut, the oblique

T.content: un autre tympan > tympanum, Dionysianism, labyrinth, the spiral walkways of a shell stretched out to sea, ramps don’t hold [play w/ limaçon and conque]
T.linkedContent: un autre tympan > tympanum, Dionysianism, labyrinth, the spiral walkways of a shell stretched out to sea, ramps don’t hold [play w/ limaçon and conque]

T.content: logic of event, structures of expropriation: timbre (tympanum), style and signature > same obliterating division of the proper, make every event possible, necessary, unfindable
T.linkedContent: logic of event, structures of expropriation: timbre (tympanum), style and signature > same obliterating division of the proper, make every event possible, necessary, unfindable

T.content: how to put one’s hands on tympanum so it can escape from hands of philosopher, so he can no longer recognize his phallogocentrism [play w/ mains, maintenant, maintain], no longer rediscover himself, no longer able to say: I will have anticipated it w/ absolute knowledge
T.linkedContent: how to put one’s hands on tympanum so it can escape from hands of philosopher, so he can no longer recognize his phallogocentrism [play w/ mains, maintenant, maintain], no longer rediscover himself, no longer able to say: I will have anticipated it w/ absolute knowledge

T.content: how to interpret (interpretation as neither a theory nor discursive practice of philosophy) the discourse that organizes economy of its [philosophy’s] representation, its weave, so nothing surprises: reasons from w/in vault (cave) of its autism
T.linkedContent: how to interpret (interpretation as neither a theory nor discursive practice of philosophy) the discourse that organizes economy of its [philosophy’s] representation, its weave, so nothing surprises: reasons from w/in vault (cave) of its autism

T.content: interpretation as luxating philosophical ear, set loxōs in logos to work, une tout autre forme d’embuscade, lokhos, block correspondence muffling other hammer [speaks to him w/ third ear]
T.linkedContent: interpretation as luxating philosophical ear, set loxōs in logos to work, une tout autre forme d’embuscade, lokhos, block correspondence muffling other hammer [speaks to him w/ third ear]

T.content: this ecorchè (destroy the tympanum) (Dissemination too was to “skin the ear”), brain dissection, burnt head > pursues deconstruction of triangulocircular structure (Oedipus, Trinity, Speculative Dialectics)
T.linkedContent: this ecorchè (destroy the tympanum) (Dissemination too was to “skin the ear”), brain dissection, burnt head > pursues deconstruction of triangulocircular structure (Oedipus, Trinity, Speculative Dialectics)

T.content: from Vitruvius’ wedge to Hegelian spiral [Vitruvius’ tympanum to Lafaye’s tympanum]
T.linkedContent: from Vitruvius’ wedge to Hegelian spiral [Vitruvius’ tympanum to Lafaye’s tympanum]

T.content: pp. leiris xxvi-xxvii [Leiris’ phonograph (purely sonorous idiom that cannot be expressed w/ words) “mirrors” literature on printing press tympanum]
T.linkedContent: pp. leiris xxvi-xxvii [Leiris’ phonograph (purely sonorous idiom that cannot be expressed w/ words) “mirrors” literature on printing press tympanum]

T.content: khōra—as tympanum, watches over its margins as virgin, homogenous, negative space, leaving its outside outside, w/out mark, w/out opposition > ready to receive and repercuss type
T.linkedContent: khōra—as tympanum, watches over its margins as virgin, homogenous, negative space, leaving its outside outside, w/out mark, w/out opposition > ready to receive and repercuss type

T.content: the 4 bands of the tympanum, what can’t be read in its “luminous triangle” or oculus
T.linkedContent: the 4 bands of the tympanum, what can’t be read in its “luminous triangle” or oculus

T.content: tympanum punctures itself (se crève), grafts itself > resists concepts of machine or nature, de coupure ou de corps, resists metaphysics of castration
T.linkedContent: tympanum punctures itself (se crève), grafts itself > resists concepts of machine or nature, de coupure ou de corps, resists metaphysics of castration

REST.content: [epigraph] “POINTURE (Latin punctura), synonym for prick, blade that fixes page to be printed on tympan, hole which it makes in the paper
REST.linkedContent: [epigraph] “POINTURE (Latin punctura), synonym for prick, blade that fixes page to be printed on tympan, hole which it makes in the paper

EU.content: philosophy finds itself inscribed w/in space it can’t order, opens to an other not even its other > in a tympanum as little Hegelian as possible
EU.linkedContent: philosophy finds itself inscribed w/in space it can’t order, opens to an other not even its other > in a tympanum as little Hegelian as possible
